Reviews.Title: Went bad in less than a week. Terrible experience with vendor!
Reviews.Author: TAS "TAS"
Reviews.Content: Nice sturdy design and wires are protected. Has a great picture and very good night vision. However, despite the sturdy design, the unit went bad in less than a week.At first when I plugged it in, it was stubborn and didn't want to work. I checked all the connections and tapped the unit and it started working. I didn't think much of it at the time. With in a day or so, the camera went out so I messed with it again and it started working again. A couple days after that, it went out again for good. I checked all the connections, ran a second test wire to the unit to rule ou my first wire but it had the same results. The unit is bad. I guess that happens...However, after contacting the place where I purchased, now I have to send it back to them on my dime and if they find the unit to be bad, will send me a new one. I really wish I didn't have to deal with all this extra hassle and cost. The camera maker should test their units better before shipping them.After dealing with vendor on this, I am downgrading to 1 star because zero is not an option.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E imager, color DSP, automatic CDS sensor. NTSC system
700 TV lines high resolution, high S/N ratio and high color reproduction
Built-in 65 Infrared LEDs. The vari-focal 4-9mm lens can adjust the image distance
Weatherproof housing. IP66. Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
Package included: 1 of SONY CCD camera, 1 of power supply, 1 of video power extension cable with BNC RCA connectors, 1 of security warning Decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 700TVL Outdoor Zoom Security Camera Day Night Vision Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E DSP 65 IR Infrared Leds 4-9mm Varifocal 3X Zoom Lens for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance with Power Supply and Video Power Extension Cable CKA
